titles.title: Targeted Economic Development Block Grant Program Act of 1993
To amend title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to establish an economic development block grant program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 2/18/1993--Introduced. Targeted Economic Development Block Grant Program Act of 1993 - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to establish a targeted economic development block grant program for qualifying metropolitan cities. Authorizes appropriations.
